short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension browser action will connect to teddycan search to vote a link cool or uncool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some web pages are unbiased, factually correct, and some are not. TeddyCanVote.Com allows you to tag them accordingly. Help us build a better internet. Once you are at a page that you may like to vote/comment for or against, just click on the extension icon, and you are ready to vote - it is that simple, easy and quick. Election season is upon us. You can 'unspin' political 'spin' using this extension.
